channel.title: Comments on: Multi-touch Seems To Be The Next User Interface
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Right :) Nice observation of the difference between "want" and "mean". I'll remember that.
item.content:encoded:
Right :)
Nice observation of the difference between “want” and “mean”. I’ll remember that.

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: Well, there's still no really good interface which is "do what i want", and perfect one "do what i mean".
item.content:encoded: Well, there’s still no really good interface which is “do what i want”, and perfect one “do what i mean”.
